name: Lullaby of Obedience
text:
Pay 2000 LP and declare 1 Monster Card name; your opponent looks at their Deck, reveals 1 of the declared monsters if there is any, and applies 1 of these effects.
â—? Add it to the hand of the player who activated this card.
â—? The player who activated this card Special Summons it to their field in Attack Position, ignoring its Summoning conditions.
